CardText: [Activate・Main] (1) Rest this card: Draw 1 card.
[Continuous] While you have 3 or more rested Units this card gains +2 AP.
[Activate・Main] Choose 1 of your Units. It gains +3 AP until end of turn.
[Continuous] Your Units with 'Gundam' in their name gain +1 HP.
[On Deploy] You may search your deck for a red Command card reveal it and add it to your hand.
[On Attack] If defending player has no active Units deal 1 damage to their Base.
[Activate・Main] Choose 1 of your Units with damage. Remove all damage from it.
[Activate・Main] Choose 1 enemy Unit. It cannot activate abilities until end of turn.
[Continuous] Once per turn when you play a red Unit you may draw 1 card.
[Continuous] When paired the Link Unit gains +2 AP.
[On Deploy] Deal 2 damage to target enemy Unit.
[Continuous] This Unit gains +1 AP for each of your rested resources.
[Link Unit] This Unit can attack on the turn it's deployed when paired with a Pilot.
[Continuous] When paired the Link Unit gains FirstStrike.
[On Attack] You may rest 1 resource. If you do this Unit gains +3 AP until end of battle.
[Activate・Main] (2) Choose 1 enemy Unit. Deal 3 damage to it.
[On Deploy] Choose 1 of your Units. It gains Blocker until end of turn.
[At start of your turn] Set 1 active resource.
[On Deploy] Destroy all enemy Units with 3 or less HP.
[On Attack] Deal 1 damage to defending player's Base.
[Burst] When this card is broken as a shield return it to your hand instead.
[Link Unit] [On Attack] Deal 2 damage to target enemy Unit.
[Continuous] When paired the Link Unit gains Blocker and Repair(2).
[Activate・Main] (3) Destroy target enemy Unit with 5 or less HP.
